title: Ep. 104 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://3Chi.com and use code BEARS at checkout to receive 5% off your order - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “CAVE” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Get your first visit absolutely free at https://forhims.com/bears. - Get 20% Off + Free Shipping at https://Manscaped.com/BEARS - Get 10% off your first month of online therapy at https://BetterHelp.com/BEARS. - Visit https://SimpliSafe.com/bears for 20% off your entire new system and your first month of monitoring service FREE, when you enroll in Interactive Monitoring. - Download the DraftKings app NOW and use promo code BEARS to get a FREE shot at MILLIONS in total prizes with your first deposit!

This week on 2 Bears, 1 Cave with Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer, the bears look over Rap Snacks and debate if they should reinvent cereals! Bert tells Tom how he watched him sleep last time he was in Austin, Tom tells Bert how some kids thought he was security at a store he was shopping at, and Bert shares how it's a shame his daughters won't be able to date anyone cool like him. Bert and Nadav agree to go on a weight loss kick and be each others accountabili-buddies, and Bert goes down a rabbit hole of what male toys he's going to get for himself.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
